I am a data scientist specializing in time series analysis and forecasting. In my free time, besides spending time with my family,  I enjoy developing packages and tools for time series analysis in R. Moreover, my passion for time series analysis and forecasting lead me to write a book about it - ["Hands-On Time Series Analysis with R"](https://www.amazon.com/Hands-Time-Analysis-forecasting-visualization/dp/1788629159/ref=tmm_pap_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1575120129&sr=), which released on May 2019:
